quote: However, A·bimʹe·lech had not gone near her. So he said: “Jehovah, will you kill a nation that is really innocent?
At this the Levite man, the husband of the murdered woman, said in answer: “I came to Gibʹe·ah of Benjamin with my concubine to stay overnight.
To this the king of Israel answered: “According to your word, my lord the king, I am yours along with all that belongs to me.”
